#summary How to organize endurance races with Cozer

= How to specify race course =

In `General Information/Race pattern` table


= How to generate intermediate results =

U.I.M. rules require that intermediate results are posted during a race.

In cozer, everytime you wish to generate results report, in `Edit Race Record` page you must re-select all class/heat combinations currently running. Then go to `Reports` page and select `Endurance Full Final` as a report type.
